meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Ukraine.
meanings.sent1: In Ukraine, you can buy many things with a hryvnya.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for hryvnyas at the bank.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken bring a hryvnya to the dance party?
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a shiny hryvnya.
meanings.sent5: The hryvnya jingled in his pocket as he walked.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Ukraine.
meanings.sent1: The price of the toy was just one hryvnya.
meanings.sent2: She saved up all her hryvnyas to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to pay for the fish with a hryvnya.
meanings.sent4: His words were worth more than a thousand hryvnyas.
meanings.sent5: The hryvnya slipped from her fingers and rolled away.
